body: strip_suffix strip_suffix(target:Union[str, NoneType], suffix:Union[str, NoneType]) -> Union[str, NoneType] Remove the given suffix from the target if it is present there. x = fe.util.strip_suffix("astring.json", ".json") # "astring" x = fe.util.strip_suffix("astring.json", ".yson") # "astring.json" Args: target : A string to be formatted. suffix : A string to be removed from target. Returns: The formatted version of `target`.
title: strip_suffix
